transArray.content:
Location: The subway is relatively close and convenient.

Environment: Fresh and elegant as always.

Service: The service is very good, and the room upgrade was a small surprise.

Facilities: The room is as clean and tidy as ever, the bed is very comfortable and has a sense of envelopment, and the water flow in the bath is strong and comfortable.
Hello! The best advertising is word-of-mouth recommendations from our customers. We are honored that our services have been recognized by you. Looking forward to your next stay!
